0111101001001001 0100111110010001 1 -> sum: 1100100111011011, cout: 0
0111010011011100 0101001000010100 1 -> sum: 1100011011110001, cout: 0
1010110110011000 0000101110000010 0 -> sum: 1011100100011010, cout: 0
0110010011111100 1011001001100010 0 -> sum: 0001011101011110, cout: 1
1001010011010001 1100101010011000 0 -> sum: 0101111101101001, cout: 1
0011011101110111 1110011100010000 0 -> sum: 0001111010000111, cout: 1
